name: CFP: Brolly. Journal of Social Sciences (London, UK)
content: Submission Deadline: November 25, 2018 Brolly. Journal of Social Sciences (Vol. 1, No. 3, December 2018) London Academic Publishing, UK ISSN 2516-869X (Print) ISSN 2516-8703 (Online) No publication fee will be charged.
